title: Urbanization in China 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in sri lanka from 2008 to 2018 . urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2018 , 18.48 percent of sri lanka 's total population lived in urban areas and cities .
gold: This statistic shows the degree of urbanization in China from 2008 to 2018 . Urbanization means the share of urban population in the total population of a country . In 2018 , 59.15 percent of China 's total population lived in urban areas and cities .
